name: Scotland Wired Map Sweatshirt
description:
A fun typographical map of Scotland, Castles, mountains, rivers, lochs, trees and coo's, surrounded by fish. Even St. Kilda is on it, but unfortunately we could not fit Shetland on our printing screen, we will provide free stickers.

Dress it up, dress it down layer it, sleep in it, live in it share your life with it. 

Black and Blue print,100% Certified Organic Cotton Brushed sweatshirt 3-ply 300g.

Comes in  M, L Please see our sizing chart.

Proudly made in Scotland

description:

Dress it up, dress it down layer it, sleep in it, live in it share your life with it. 

Black and Blue print, White and Black 100% Combed Cotton. Jersey 170gsm
Comes in M, L, XL.  Please see our sizing chart.

Proudly made in Scotland

name: Ain't no Surf in Portobello retro tee/base layer
description:
We continue to pay homage to all the great unsurfed Scottish secret surf spots. 
Also inspired by the name of the song form one of Scotland's first true Punk bands, The Valves. "Aint no surf in portobello " - 1977 a great year ! 

So in true retro Scottish surf style, we give you the ultimate portobello surf T!

Surf it at your own risk.. Its gnarly!

Dress it up, dress it down layer it, sleep in it, live in it share your life with it. 

Orange/Black print on White and Black 100% Combed Cotton. Jersey 170gsm
Comes in M, L, XL. Please see our sizing chart.

Proudly made in Scotland

name: Morning Glory Sweatshirt
description:
SHARE THE STOKE!!! Cold, exciting, scared, mesmerised, rejuvenated, hypnotized, unforgiving, honoured, self reflecting, humbled, treasured, rewarding. 

Difficult to describe the exact feelings but we are simply inspired by the raw majestic power and beauty of our North Sea. The way she influences our lives and how we live our lives, her daily tides, storms, winds and waves.

Dress it up, dress it down layer it, sleep in it, live in it share your life with it.  

Blue/Black/Orange print on 100% Certified Organic Cotton Brushed sweatshirt 3-ply 300g.

Comes in M, L. Please see our sizing chart.

Proudly made in Scotland

name: Wild Cat T-shirt (W)
description:
The Scottish wild cat a rare feline species found only in and unique to Scotland, also known as the "Highland tiger" they should never be under estimated or be handled without gloves...!!
Ladies this shirt looks and feels soft .. and hangings with style.
Chest size -    M - 30/32   L - 32/34 XL - 34/36 - if you need a little extra room round the middle and don't want to show a muffin, pick the next size up.

Black print on Red  70% bamboo - 30% cotton shirt.

Proudly made in Scotland

name: Stag print - textured background
description:
The Staunch Wilderness range celebrates the magnificent wild life that covets our Scottish land and shores. 

A fine art print of original screen printed art work by award winning illustrator 
Will Beeslaar (for Staunch).

The 'Wilderness' print is printed in editions of 30. Each print is of the highest quality, each edition is hand numbered and signed, making each one a genuine original artwork. 

These stylish archival quality prints are on 350gsm fine art paper, sold without mount or frame. Each unframed print comes rolled in acid free tissue paper in a sturdy cardboard tube.

Dimension paper size A2, 40cm x 60cm.

Please note that these prints take up to 7 days from order and will be sent Royal mail signed for in the UK. For further afield please contact for exact post price.

A fine art print of original screen printed art work by award winning illustrator Will Beeslaar (for Staunch).

A fine art print of original screen printed art work by award winning illustrator Will Beeslaar (for Staunch).

name: Staunch logo T-shirt  (W)
description:
Female "Shirt lifters of the world unite and take over" 

A Staunch T-shirt for girls... No more complaints. about time to represent!

This is a lovely vintage washed T-shirt, with a vibrant thick print. We love it. 

Ladies this shirt looks and feels soft .. and hangings with style.

Dress it up, dress it down layer it, sleep in it, live in it share your life with it.  

Chest size -    M - 32/34 L - 36/38 - if you need a little extra room round the middle and don't want to show a muffin, pick the next size up. 

Magenta and Blue print on Charcoal 70% bamboo - 30% cotton shirt.

Proudly made in Scotland

name: Stauncho sox's
description:
Our man from Africa just brought us in some new stock! Whoop Whoop

The story begins in an old folks home perched high above the cranking right of Jeffreys Bay, South Africa. 
Home of Wills Aunt Tikkie and her senior knitting club. On hearing about Staunch, Aunt Tikkie was keen to help her dearest nephew with his label. Tikkie and her granny friends sat up pouring over patterns. Finally they dug deep into their knitting baskets and the stauncho sox was born.

A slipper, sock hybrid, the humble sox is the perfect antidote for people with cold feet it is made for campervan life. 
More compact than its bulky brother the slipper, yet more versatile than its limp sister the sock.

name: Scotland Wired Map sweat -Blue
description:
CONTACT US NOW TO PREORDER- COMING SOON!!!

A fun typographical map of Scotland, Castles, mountains, rivers, lochs, trees and coo's, surrounded by fish. Even St. Kilda is on it, but unfortunately we could not fit Shetland on our printing screen, we will provide it on a free sticker.

Comes in  M & L Please see our sizing chart.

Proudly made in Scotland

CONTACT US NOW TO PREORDER- COMING SOON!!!

name: Geared T-shirt (M)
description:
A great graphical representation of our adventurous spirits, not to mention our cluttered car boot space...
Compus? Tick 
Ice pick? Tick 
Knuckle dusters? Ehh?

Orange and Blue print on Charcoal T-shirt 100% cotton.
Comes in M & L. Please see our sizing chart.

Proudly made in Scotland

name: Cranking! T-shirt (M)
description:
Dig deep and go beyond your limits. Cranking up the gears with a cracking cocktail of super cool dreams

Green and Blue print Royal Blue T-shirt 100% cotton. 
Comes in M & L. Please see our sizing chart.

Proudly made in Scotland

name: Magic Aquatic  T-shirt (M)
description:
A combination of form meets function and another design in our series with the fragile North Sea eco environment in mind.

Oh whale, the majestic leviathan of the sea, what message do you bring?

Black print on Red T-shirt 100% cotton. 
Comes in M & L .Please see our sizing chart.

Proudly made in Scotland

name: Staunch Candy Chair  2#Orange
description:
Individual or as a set these chairs have all been professionally restored using traditional methods, new wadding and re-upholstered using our own hand printed Kelpie canvas fabric finished in lip smacking Red, Green, Orange or Yellow high gloss finish. 

Will bring a smile to any room.

name: Staunch Candy Chair 2#Green
description:
Individual or as a set these chairs have all been professionally restored using traditional methods, new wadding and re-upholstered using our own hand printed Kelpie canvas fabric,  coated for a wipeable finish for those messy eaters out there finished in lip smacking Red, Green, Orange or Yellow high gloss finish. 

Will bring a smile to any room.

name: Staunch Candy Chair 1#Red
description:
Individual or as a set these chairs have all been professionally restored using traditional methods, new wadding and re-upholstered using our own hand printed Kelpie fabric,  coated for a wipeable finish for those messy eaters out there finished in lip smacking Red, Green, Orange or Yellow high gloss finish. 

Will bring a smile to any room.

description:

Will bring a smile to any room.

name: Coffee table
description:
If you don't have the space for the set this wonderful table will be all the chat at any coffee morning. Finished in yellow matt with hand grey graphic of the outside in. Hills lochs and castles of Scotland, magazine ledge in yellow with contrasting grey legs. 

Dimensions       Length  121cm 
                        Height  50cm
                        Width   40cm

name: Sideboard - Blue
description:
The little brother of the big yellow finished to the same high standard with painstaking love to achieve this fantastic look of the "outside in"
The hills lochs and castles of Scotland if you look closely you will find the coo.. 
Finished in powder blue matt with gun grey graphic, internal colour grey contrasting blue drawer. 

Dimensions  Length 169cm (5ft)                      
                    Height 65cm
                    Width  48cm

name: Kelpie Louis Chair and footstool
description:
This chair has been lavished with the light catching bone high gloss finish, upholstered to an elegant state upholstered in our hand   
printed canvas kelpie fabric,  detailed and trimmed with metal studs, note the full centering of this design front, back and arms. This is a stand alone piece that makes an entrance a statement.

name: Gone Fishing chair
description:
No flies on these chair's if you can't catch them at least you can drink with them. These two show stoppers are classic beasts, they have been hand sanded oiled and restored back to life, the cushions have been professional upholstered in our own fantastic fish fabric. 
A must for any fishing or aquatic enthusiast out there!! 
Stunning as a set or individually.

name: Staunch Candy Chair 2#Red
description:
Individual or as a set these chairs have all been professionally restored using traditional methods, new wadding and re-upholstered using our own hand printed Kelpie fabric,  coated for a wipeable finish for those messy eaters out there finished in lip smacking Red, Green, Orange or Yellow high gloss finish. 

Will bring a smile to any room.

name: Staunch logo T-shirt (M)
description:
About time to represent!

Great quality thick print on a well cut soft cotton vintage shirt, you cant ask much more than that. 

Green print on Black T-shirt 100% cotton  Comes in S M & L . Please see our sizing chart.

Proudly made in Scotland

name: Trident T-Shirt (M)
description:
Now your talking. 

A mighty Staunch Neptune's trident graphic. Its on!

100% cotton RedT-shirt black print. Comes in  S, M & L

Please see our sizing chart.
Proudly made in Scotland

name: Skate or Die T-shirt (M)
description:
Actually it looks to me like a thornback ray:
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thornback_ray

I remember catching one of these big boys on a hand reel back in 88. My hands red raw after the epic battle of boy vs sea monster. 

We have more coming guys.. 

T-shirt 100% cotton Marl grey Dark red print . Comes in  S, M & L Please see our sizing chart.

Proudly made in Scotland

name: Bury me at sea T-shirt (M)
description:
"Bury me at sea"

That's been bouncing around in our brain boxes for a while. Now its on a shirt! 

A thick bright print on a well cut shirt. Believe me they look grand! 

Its got a wee anchor on the front and a big ol diving helmet on the back. 

When my time comes do exactly as it says

100% cotton Black T-shirt Blue print. Comes in  S, M & L 
Please see our sizing chart.
Proudly made in Scotland

name: Boardroom T-shirt (M)
description:
We are chairmen of the board, having a board meeting in the board room. !!


That's too good. 
So this little brown number represents our love for all shapes and sizes. The fun of riding different boards, experimenting. It's also a tribute to the abuse some of us suffer for clogging the house full of boards.

Smooth clean lines and a sweet design.

100% cotton Brown T-shir Blue ?orange print. Comes in  S, M, L, XL 
Please see our sizing chart.
Proudly made in Scotland

name: All at Sea T-shirt (M)
description:
"Darling its better down where its wetter under the sea" A wise old crab once said that.

For this T we spent too long selecting our favourite underwater North Sea creatures. 

Get your fish on!
Aqua Blue and orange print on Black T-shirt 100% cotton. 
Comes in S M L XL .

Please see our sizing chart.

Proudly made in Scotland

name: All at Sea T-shirt (W)
description:
"Darling its better down where its wetter under the sea" A wise old crab once said that.

For this T we spent too long selecting our favourite underwater creatures. If you can name them all, email us a list we will send you a bunch of stickers, how's that for a deal. 

Get your fish on!

100% Black cotton T Pink & Orange print 
Available S,M,L


Proudly made in Scotland

name: Map T-Shirt (M)
description:
A massive apology to the good folk of Shetland. In some horrible printing accident we left them off our first map t-shirt.

So, here you are peeps, a brand new map design. This time it's a bit smaller to squeeze in our Northern brothers and sisters.

From a design point of view though, you have to admit, Shetland is in a pretty awkward position all the way up there.

But we think of you often..


Black print on  Yellow T-shirt 100% cotton.  
Comes in M & L . Please see our sizing chart.

Proudly made in Scotland

name: Electric Scotland T-Shirt (W)
description:
More maps for your pleasure.

This time its a party number for midnight marauding. 

100% cotton Black T-shirtwith thick Purple print Comes in  S, M & L Please see our sizing chart.

Proudly made in Scotland

name: Kelpie Hood (W)
description:
Are you sitting comfortably???

The Kelpie is a supernatural shape shifting water spirit with an insatiable appetite for humans. Its most common guise is that of a beautiful tame horse standing by the river bank. A tempting ride for any weary traveller. Anybody foolish enough to mount the horse would find themselves in deep s*!t, as the horse would rear up and charge headlong into the depths, submerging with a noise like thunder taking the rider to a watery grave. The Kelpie also warned of impending storms by wailing and howling, which would carry on through the tempest.

Wow scary stuff! Get it on and feel the power

100% cotton midnight blue Hood thick turquoise print .

Comes in  S, M & L Please see our sizing chart.

Proudly made in Scotland

name: Trident Hood (W)
description:
Now your talking. 

A mighty Staunch Neptune's trident graphic. Its on!
We did you a special limited edition glimmery silver trident hoodie. 

These are super sweet.. throw it on and feel the heat
100% cotton black hood silver print.
Comes in S M & L . 

Please see our sizing chart.

Proudly made in Scotland
